Detailed Description

Defines a tool to display zebra map on a surface.

void mgSysZebraGL::draw ( MGOpenGLView &  glv  )  const [virtual]

Draw this Sysgl.

This draw is used to draw the pictures for Undo(, Redo) operations. When this draw is invoked, all of the functions of mgGDL can be used in that context.
